title: Installation issue: rocm-validation-suite-4.2.0 asks for root privileges
body:
@srekolam @arjun-raj-kuppala

I don't know why Cmake is trying to override `/usr/bin/python` but this is unacceptable behavior.

Also at the next step it tries to aquire root privileges via `sudo` which shouldn't be needed by any package that Spack installs.


### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack spec rocm-validation-suite@4.2.0 ^cmake@3.17.5 %gcc@10.3.0
Input spec
--------------------------------
rocm-validation-suite@4.2.0
    ^cmake@3.17.5%gcc@10.3.0

Concretized
--------------------------------
rocm-validation-suite@4.2.0%gcc@10.3.0~ipo build_type=Release patches=130a81c8076a30a8acf192c1cc03710d9d0b28566d36ac7c5c2411965d755091,693f3f61bbb8f225c150f6ed1df08e89b931c258c212d78ca3399dc23d93ec69 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
    ^cmake@3.17.5%gcc@10.3.0~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt build_type=Release patches=bf695e3febb222da2ed94b3beea600650e4318975da90e4a71d6f31a6d5d8c3d arch=linux-centos7-zen2
        ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@10.3.0~symlinks+termlib abi=none arch=linux-centos7-zen2
            ^pkgconf@1.7.4%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
        ^openssl@1.1.1k%gcc@10.3.0~docs+systemcerts arch=linux-centos7-zen2
            ^perl@5.34.0%gcc@10.3.0+cpanm+shared+threads arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                ^berkeley-db@18.1.40%gcc@10.3.0+cxx~docs+stl patches=b231fcc4d5cff05e5c3a4814f6a5af0e9a966428dc2176540d2c05aff41de522 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                ^gdbm@1.19%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                    ^readline@8.1%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
            ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@10.3.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-zen2
    ^comgr@4.2.0%gcc@10.3.0~ipo build_type=Release patches=4dda4b3dcd61df74050076881e102c6f4ec637ea8f35a3a4e7079b8a4fa9af4c arch=linux-centos7-zen2
        ^llvm-amdgpu@4.2.0%gcc@10.3.0~ipo+openmp build_type=Release patches=d999f3b235e655ee07f6dd2590302082feaa06d32c5c6b53aae9c5cf1e45b644 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
            ^hwloc@2.4.1%gcc@10.3.0~cairo~cuda~gl~libudev+libxml2~netloc~nvml+pci+shared arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                ^libpciaccess@0.16%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                    ^libtool@2.4.6%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                        ^m4@1.4.19%gcc@10.3.0+sigsegv arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                            ^libsigsegv@2.13%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                    ^util-macros@1.19.1%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                ^libxml2@2.9.10%gcc@10.3.0~python arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                    ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                    ^xz@5.2.5%gcc@10.3.0~pic libs=shared,static arch=linux-centos7-zen2
            ^libelf@0.8.13%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
            ^perl-data-dumper@2.173%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
            ^python@3.8.10%gcc@10.3.0+bz2+ctypes+dbm~debug+libxml2+lzma~nis~optimizations+pic+pyexpat+pythoncmd+readline+shared+sqlite3+ssl~tix~tkinter~ucs4+uuid+zlib patches=0d98e93189bc278fbc37a50ed7f183bd8aaf249a8e1670a465f0db6bb4f8cf87 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@10.3.0~debug~pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                    ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                ^expat@2.3.0%gcc@10.3.0+libbsd arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                    ^libbsd@0.11.3%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                        ^libmd@1.0.3%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                ^gettext@0.21%gcc@10.3.0+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                    ^tar@1.34%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2

            ^z3@4.8.9%gcc@10.3.0+python arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                ^py-setuptools@50.3.2%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2

        ^rocm-device-libs@4.2.0%gcc@10.3.0~ipo build_type=Release arch=linux-centos7-zen2
            ^texinfo@6.5%gcc@10.3.0 patches=12f6edb0c6b270b8c8dba2ce17998c580db01182d871ee32b7b6e4129bd1d23a,1732115f651cff98989cb0215d8f64da5e0f7911ebf0c13b064920f088f2ffe1 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
    ^hip@4.2.0%gcc@10.3.0~ipo build_type=RelWithDebInfo patches=2a4190477b7d9206b9cd8d70770ba0bc007273cbe54772efb12f9ca2e37c0392,e276c4acf3d37712b6bea306fea34f539d3c4f743471e9da208b5eb17b16ae67 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
        ^hip-rocclr@4.2.0%gcc@10.3.0~ipo build_type=RelWithDebInfo arch=linux-centos7-zen2
            ^hsa-rocr-dev@4.2.0%gcc@10.3.0+image~ipo+shared build_type=Release patches=71e6851d9be8113bfb8d71b66a3171e0d0401bae5e6f161c9e7fe32558261a46 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                ^hsakmt-roct@4.2.0%gcc@10.3.0~ipo+shared build_type=Release arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                    ^numactl@2.0.14%gcc@10.3.0 patches=4e1d78cbbb85de625bad28705e748856033eaafab92a66dffd383a3d7e00cc94,62fc8a8bf7665a60e8f4c93ebbd535647cebf74198f7afafec4c085a8825c006 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                        ^autoconf@2.69%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                        ^automake@1.16.3%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                ^xxd-standalone@8.2.1201%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
            ^mesa18@18.3.6%gcc@10.3.0+glx~llvm~opengles+osmesa patches=55a5611ca9fcbe8324c4d68a07b338134954ff12c5b122dc78ff376f012a1414,e0a94aa728c233968137ca1314f6541745228a98d66822ad518b102f5a31b487 swr=none arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                ^binutils@2.36.1%gcc@10.3.0~gas~gold~headers~interwork~ld~libiberty~lto+nls+plugins libs=shared,static arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                ^bison@3.7.6%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                ^flex@2.6.3%gcc@10.3.0+lex~nls arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                    ^findutils@4.8.0%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                ^glproto@1.4.17%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                ^libx11@1.7.0%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                    ^inputproto@2.3.2%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                    ^kbproto@1.0.7%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                    ^libxcb@1.14%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                        ^libpthread-stubs@0.4%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                        ^libxau@1.0.8%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                            ^xproto@7.0.31%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                        ^libxdmcp@1.1.2%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                        ^xcb-proto@1.14.1%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                    ^xextproto@7.3.0%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                    ^xtrans@1.3.5%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                ^libxext@1.3.3%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                ^py-mako@1.1.4%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
                    ^py-markupsafe@1.1.1%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
        ^rocminfo@4.2.0%gcc@10.3.0~ipo build_type=RelWithDebInfo arch=linux-centos7-zen2
    ^rocblas@4.2.0%gcc@10.3.0~ipo build_type=RelWithDebInfo tensile_architecture=all arch=linux-centos7-zen2
        ^msgpack-c@3.1.1%gcc@10.3.0~ipo build_type=RelWithDebInfo arch=linux-centos7-zen2
        ^perl-file-which@1.22%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
        ^py-msgpack@1.0.2%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
        ^py-pyyaml@5.3.1%gcc@10.3.0+libyaml arch=linux-centos7-zen2
            ^libyaml@0.2.5%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
        ^py-virtualenv@16.7.6%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
        ^py-wheel@0.36.2%gcc@10.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-zen2
    ^rocm-smi-lib@4.2.0%gcc@10.3.0~ipo+shared build_type=Release arch=linux-centos7-zen2
```

- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers

- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
